name: UKUM
description:
UKUM is an endless falling (Runner) game inspired by Altos adventure, downwell and Ridiculus fishing, where you play as a Volador de Papantla one of four brave people that dances while on a free fall only atached to a tree trunk, in this game you will have to collect MAIZ (Corn), and fall faster and faster so you can beat the sunset and enter the reign of mictlan (the mexican land of the death).

PDF PITCH : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CmDf7fYQoIuJyjKJPat3gwYyA_Iof47D/view?usp=shari...

Twitter : https://twitter.com/JuaanC64

NOTE: DOWNLOAD V 0.2

As of right now the game has a bug where it can only be displayed well in screens close in resolution aspect ratio 19 /6 or 16 / 9, please play using a phone, almost every phone has that aspect ratio, do not use a tablet to test.

when fized this message will be deleted.

How to play:

(Android Marshmallow 6.0 minimum)

Tilt phone right to move right

Tilt phone left to move left

Press anywhere in the screen to spin, this destroys bushes.

Enjoy!

Credits:

Developed by Jesus CG

Music from Open Game Art
